title: Panel, 20th century
medium: Technique: Resist printed and dyed panel. Indigo in two colors plus red. (chintz)
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 250 x 90.5 cm (8 ft. 2 7/16 in. x 35 5/8 in.)
description: Piece is one half of a cover. Border on three sides. Two borders at top and bottom. Field of massed flowers on black background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Panel, 20th century.
20th century. Technique: Resist printed and dyed panel. Indigo in two colors plus red. (chintz). Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-322.
